message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value, worth $12000 to you, and I believe it would greatly benefit your needs. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special price of $10000. This is an excellent deal, considering the high value it brings to you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
